class PlotLine[source]

PlotLine(chart=None, x_axis_type='linear') :: BasePlot

data = {
    'year': [2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020],
    'fruit': ['apple', 'apple', 'apple', 'apple', 'apple', 'momo', 'momo', 'momo', 'momo', 'momo' , 'melon', 'melon', 'melon', 'melon', 'melon'],
    'price': [10, 11, 12, 13, 11, 15, 20, 11, 12, 13 , 20, 20, 21, 22, 23]
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)
df
pl = PlotLine()
pl.line(df, x='year', y='price', color='fruit')
pl.show()
pd.pivot_table(df, index='year', columns='fruit', values='price').reset_index()

data = {
    'dt': [2010,2011,2012,2013,2014,2015],
    'fruit': ['apple', 'apple', 'apple', 'apple', 'apple',  'apple'],
    'price': [10, 11, 12, 13, 11, 10]
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)
#print(df['dt'].dtype == object)
import numpy as np
df['price'].dtype == np.int64

pl = PlotLine()
pl.line(df, x='dt', y='price', color='fruit')
pl.show()
